CmdLine: apt-get -y update     && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y -q  --no-install-recommends --no-install-suggests install         php7.1         php7.1-fpm         php7.1-gd         php7.1-apcu         php7.1-sqlite         php7.1-pgsql         php7.1-mysql         php7.1-intl         php7.1-simplexml         php7.1-sybase         php7.1-geoip         php7.1-gmp         php7.1-readline         php7.1-mcrypt         php7.1-xmlrpc         php7.1-json         php7.1-curl         php7.1-soap         php7.1-zip         php7.1-mbstring         php7.1-bcmath         php-pear         php-apcu-bc         php-redis         ruby2.0         ruby2.0-dev         build-essential         openssh-client         wget         curl         exim4         libxrender1         gsfonts         libssl-dev=1.0.1f-1ubuntu2.23         supervisor     && curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_8.x | sudo -E bash -     && curl -sS https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/pubkey.gpg | sudo apt-key add -     && echo "deb https://dl.yarnpkg.com/debian/ stable main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/yarn.list     && apt-get -y update && DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -f -y -q install yarn nodejs      && gem2.0 install sass --no-user-install     && apt-get clean
